summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the City Engineer to incur an indebtedness against the General Fund of The City of Seattle, in the sum of Three Thousand Five Hundred Thirty-one and 50/100 Dollars ($3531.50) for the purpose of completing the improvement of East Denny Way et al, by paving the same, as authorized by Ordinance No. 20368, creating Local Improvement District No. 1963.
